DOC.brief_summary: The rein registry collects case record data from patients with end stage renal disease followed in French Guiana. This allows to generate incidence and rates for terminal renal disease, mortality rates for each territory. The regional data are pooled in order to get national statistics for end stage renal disease and transplantation activity in order to adapt prevention to the main causes of renal failure and treatment and care infrastructure.
DOC.brief_title: Registry for End Stage Renal Failure
DOC.criteria: End Stage Renal Failure Refusal to participate
